State of Rhode Island General Laws

NOTE:  The Legislature and Legislative Data Systems does try to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of the information placed on this page by making regular daily updates. There may be times between updates, however, when information is not current, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. This information is prepared as an informational service only and should not be relied upon as an official record of any action taken by the Rhode Island General Assembly. This information is provisional. For matters affecting legal rights, please refer to the printed version of the appropriate official publication.
